text: Which of the following statement(s) is/are not TRUE? (a) Memory management systems that use page-based memory allocation (for thelowest level) do not suffer from external fragmentation. (b) A memory fault will always cause the faulting process to be terminated by theoperating system. (c) When using demand paging, adding more memory to a system will always reduce the number of pagefaults. (d) The working set of a process is the set of memory locations that it accesses throughout its lifetime.
